original_text: Before they went, he said to them, ‘Many people are ready to believe God's message. They are like crops in a field at harvest time. But there are very few workers to bring in the crops. So pray to God to send out workers. The field and the plants belong to him.’
korean_text: 이르시되 추수할 것은 많되 일꾼이 적으니 그러므로 추수하는 주인에게 청하여 추수할 일꾼들을 보내 주소서 하라

sentences.original_text: Many people are ready to believe God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 하나님의 메시지를 믿을 준비가 되어 있다

sentences.original_text: They are like crops in a field at harvest time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 수확 때의 밭에 있는 곡식과 같다

sentences.original_text: But there are very few workers to bring in the crops
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 곡식을 거둘 일꾼이 매우 적다

sentences.original_text: So pray to God to send out workers
The field and the plants belong to him
